name: ABC Preschool
description: Pine UMC operates two school programs on the church grounds: ABC Preschool (ages 3-5) and the Pine Japanese Language Afterschool (school age children - 6 and older). Both schools are academic programs. Lessons are taught in Japanese and English. The preschool curriculum strives to enhance their reading and writing skills, and prepares them for Kindergarten. Both schools also focus on the Japanese culture, exposing the children to traditional Japanese holidays and celebrating them throughout the
